title: Marauder Ashe, how long available?
body:
So I noticed, like everone else, that Marauder Ashe is available. I'm just wondering if she's going to be available forever or if it's going to expire.

{{champion:22}}

replies.body: She is not listed as LIMITED AVAILABILITY, so I assume she was be available year-round like many other skins that you can always purchase.
